title: GDG DevFest Sofia 2018
description: DevFest is the biggest Google Developers Group event happening around the globe, focused on community building and learning about Google technologies.
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
cachingComplete: Caching complete! Future visits will work offline.

aboutBlock.title: What you need to know, before you ask.

featuredSessions.description: GDG DevFest Sofia brings together the world class experts in Android, Web and Cloud technologies to Lviv for 2 days of sessions, workshops and showcases.
featuredSessions.label: Explore featured session

howItWas.description: Described by many as 'Google I/O of Sofia', our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2016

hours.label: hours around web, mobile and cloud technology

sessions.label: speakers from Bulgaria & all over the world

tracks.label: tracks (1 main track and 1 workshop track)

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.

galleryBlock.title: #DevFest Highlights
galleryBlock.description: This year's festival built lots of excitement. Check out photos from featured talks, hands-on learning sessions, and after-hours fun.

team.description: Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime

blocks.title: GDG sofia
blocks.description: GDG Sofia is Ð° group of enthusiasts that gather around Google technologies. We organize different events - seminars, conferences or just dine outs, and discuss the latests developments.

blocks.title: What is GDG?
blocks.description: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
